alert.note: Alert for Midland; Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Saginaw, northwestern Shiawassee and Midland Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rosebush to 7 miles south of Ithaca. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sanford around 800 PM EDT. Oakley and Henderson around 835 PM EDT. Midland and Owosso around 845 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Brant, Nelson, Fenmore, Poseyville, Laporte, Averill, Gordonville, Bombay, Hemlock and Porter Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
